UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effects of two glycine residues in positions 13 and 17 of pleurocidin on structure and bacterial cell selectivity.
Literature.Author: Lim SS, Song YM, Jang MH, Kim Y, Hahm KS, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=2µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=1µM)
